text:
I have downloaded jakarta-tomcat-4.0.2.tar.gz.  I was able to gzip -d, but
tar -xvf resulted in a checksum error.  If you can provide any helpful insight 
or fix please do..

Luai Najim
creator: lan@emss.com

text: It's a problem with Sun's version of tar.  You have to use gtar.
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
